trans-unit.source: Controls how a document is printed, when printing from a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: Styr hur ett dokument skrivs ut, när du skriver ut från en Windows Forms-program.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, PrintController controls how a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> is printed.
trans-unit.target: Implementeras i en härledd klass PrintController styr hur en <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>skrivs ut.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName> invokes the print controller's <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> methods, which in turn tell the printer how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName>anropar ut controller <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>, och <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>metoder som i sin tur hur skrivaren skriva ut dokumentet.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Print preview uses a specialized PrintController.
trans-unit.target: Förhandsgranskningen använder en särskild PrintController.

trans-unit.source: For an example of a print controller that is specialized for print preview, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>.
trans-unit.target: Ett exempel på en utskrift domänkontrollant som är specialiserat för förhandsgranskning finns i <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>

trans-unit.source: PrintController is used by <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, and not typically used directly.
trans-unit.target: PrintController används av <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, och normalt inte användas direkt.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework includes three print controllers that are derived from PrintController that help accomplish common tasks.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework innehåller tre ut domänkontrollanter som är härledda från PrintController att utföra vanliga uppgifter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController> prints a document to a printer.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController>skriver ut ett dokument till en skrivare.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController> generates a preview of what the document will look like when printed and is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> classes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>genererar en förhandsgranskning av hur dokumentet ser ut när ut och används av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>och <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>klasser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> provides a printing status dialog during the printing process.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>ger en utskrift statusdialogrutan under processen för utskrift.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Mer information om utskrifter med Windows Forms finns i <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>namnområde Översikt.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill skriva ut från ett Windows Presentation Foundation-program finns i <xref:System.Printing>namnområde.</xref:System.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref> is used for print preview.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om den <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref> används för förhandsgranskning.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>i samtliga fall.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: Slutför kontroll-sekvensen som bestämmer när och hur du skriver ut en sida i dokumentet när åsidosätts i en härledd klass.

trans-unit.source: OnEndPage is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: OnEndPage anropas omedelbart efter den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>genererar den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>händelse.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, OnEndPage is not called.
trans-unit.target: Om ett undantag i en <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>händelsen för en <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, anropas inte OnEndPage.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>skapar den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>som skickas till skrivaren.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Efter <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>anropas, den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>metoden anger det <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>till en bild av en enstaka sida.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: (Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: (Använd det <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>metod för att ange hur du skriver ut en sida i dokumentet.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.) The OnEndPage method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan till exempel justera inställningar separat för varje sida.) Metoden OnEndPage rensar den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, medan den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>metoden tar bort objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> som representerar dokumentet skrivs ut.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Slutför kontroll-sekvensen som bestämmer när och hur du skriver ut ett dokument när åsidosätts i en härledd klass.

trans-unit.source: OnEndPrint is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: OnEndPrint anropas omedelbart efter den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>genererar den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>händelse.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>skapar den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>som skickas till skrivaren.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Efter <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>anropas, den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>metoden anger det <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>till en bild av en enstaka sida.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: (Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> method to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: (Använd det <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>metod för att avgöra när och hur du skriver ut ett dokument.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.) The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the OnEndPrint method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: T.ex, kan du fördröja utskrift i 30 minuter eller ändra skrivarinställningar för dokumentet.) Den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>metoden raderar den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, medan metoden OnEndPrint tar bort objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> som representerar dokumentet skrivs ut.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: När åsidosätts i en härledd klass börjar kontroll-sekvensen som bestämmer när och hur du skriver ut en sida i dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPage is called immediately before the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPage anropas omedelbart före den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>genererar den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>händelse.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>skapar den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>som skickas till skrivaren.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the OnStartPage method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Efter <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>anropas metoden OnStartPage metoden anger det <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>till en bild av en enstaka sida.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>metoden raderar den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, medan den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>metoden tar bort objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the OnStartPage method to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: Använd metoden OnStartPage om du vill ange hur du skriver ut en sida i dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.
trans-unit.target: Du kan till exempel justera inställningar separat för varje sida.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> som representerar dokumentet skrivs ut.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that represents a page from a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> som representerar en sida från en <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: När åsidosätts i en härledd klass börjar kontroll-sekvensen som bestämmer när och hur du skriver ut ett dokument.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint anropas omedelbart efter den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>genererar den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>händelse.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: Use the OnStartPrint method to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Använd metoden OnStartPrint för att avgöra när och hur du skriver ut ett dokument.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.
trans-unit.target: Du kan till exempel fördröjning utskrift i 30 minuter eller ändra skrivarinställningar för dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint skapar den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>som skickas till skrivaren.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: After OnStartPrint is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to one of a single page.
trans-unit.target: När OnStartPrint kallas den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>metoden anger det <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>av en enstaka sida.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>metoden raderar den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, medan den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>metoden tar bort objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnStartPrint method is a good place to verify that <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> are valid.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnStartPrint är en bra plats att kontrollera att <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>är giltiga.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> som representerar dokumentet skrivs ut.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.
